DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Study Tesofensine/Metoprolol Treatment Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.detailed_description: This double-blind , randomize , placebo-controlled , multiple-dose , two-center , safety efficacy study co-administration tesofensine/metoprolol treatment subject T2DM . Study medication administer ninety ( 90 ) day ( +2 day final assessment half-dose metoprolol ) . Following baseline assessment , eligible subject randomly assign one two arm ( 1:1 ) .
